author: breser
msg: On the svn-auth-x509 branch, add missing if test.
(x509_get_uid): This block was only intended to run when there was an error.
Prior to this it would segfault on any cert that actually did have v2/v3

author: breser
msg: On the svn-auth-x509 branch, don't fail on certs with v3 extensions.
(svn_x509_parse_cert): Call x509_skip_ext() in the case of v3 certs.

msg: mod_proxy_fcgi: Fix occasional high CPU when handling request bodies.
